title: MS Teams for Remote Tech Employees
description: This course is designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
By the end of this course, you will be able to navigate the interface with ease, set up your personal profile, and use chat features effectively.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.content: Learn about the purpose and benefits of using Microsoft Teams for remote work.

sections.title: Getting Started with Microsoft Teams
sections.content: Discover how to sign in, access your teams, and understand the basic layout.

sections.title: Understanding the Layout
sections.content: Explore the different sections of the interface such as chats, channels, apps, and people.

sections.title: Customizing Your Workspace
sections.content: Learn how to personalize your workspace for better productivity.

sections.title: Creating a Professional Profile
sections.content: Find out how to create and manage your personal profile, including adding a photo and bio.

sections.title: Connecting with Colleagues
sections.content: Discover ways to connect with colleagues through the people directory and direct messages.

sections.title: Basics of Chatting
sections.content: Learn how to start a chat, send messages, and use emojis and reactions.

sections.title: Advanced Chat Features
sections.content: Explore features like file sharing, screen sharing, and video calls within chats.

sections.title: Review of Key Concepts
sections.content: Recap the key concepts covered in this course.

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.content: Learn about additional resources for further learning and practice.
